amendment.description: An amendment numbered 45 printed in House Report 115-830 to maintain FY 2018 funding for an authorized program to address lead in drinking water.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A041) offered by Ms. Moore.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.
